name: Small Town (Emilia Bea)
description:
Gameplay: Short(1-3 Minutes)

Made in 72 Hours using:

  •  Unity
  • Fungus Engine
  • Paint Tool SAI
  • Bosca Ceoil

Controls:
Press space to continue story, click to interact

Note:

I recommend listening on low volume

Credit:
Programming + Art: @emiliabeaexe (on Instagram + Twitter)
Music: Owen Smith

Finally:

I had a great time in my first ludum dare. I had to cut a bunch out, as I'm sure most people did, but I will do better next time at limiting my scope!
